actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to require that no urban mass transportation project be approved by the Secretary of Transportation unless the applicant for the project gives satisfactory assurances that free transportation service will be provided to elderly and handicapped persons during nonpeak hours.

summary.text: Requires that no urban mass transportation project be approved by the Secretary of Transportation pursuant to the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 unless the applicant for the project gives satisfactory assurances that free transportation service will be provided to elderly and handicapped persons during nonpeak hours.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to require that no urban mass transportation project be approved by the Secretary of Transportation unless the applicant for the project gives satisfactory assurances that free transportation service will be provided to elderly and handicapped persons during nonpeak hours.
